episodes.title: I Was Accused Of Running A Satanic Paedophile Cult | The Hampstead Paedophile Hoax | Channel 4
episodes.description:
Strong language and descriptions of satanic sexual abuse of children from the start which viewers may find distressing.

In 2015, two children accused parents and teachers of running a baby-eating satanic cult in a Hampstead school. Conspiracy theorists around the world were gripped as four mothers fought for justice.

SUBSCRIBE: www.youtube.com/channel/UUCjhgUx7uusAZdPL6Tt8ZUQg?sub_confirmation=1 

Watch full episodes of In The Footsteps of Killers here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRgmxrYQK0n5rJih7VDndnQegiyPAKbWz

Watch full episodes of Banged Up here: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRgmxrYQK0n4MPOZ8AhwAR4KWJMo2nqXI

About #Channel4: Channel 4 exists to represent unheard voices, challenge the mainstream and stir the metaphorical pot. This YouTube is here to give you first looks at what’s coming next, to take you deeper into the shows you love and help you discover your next obsession. Like, subscribe and get involved in the conversations in the comments and remember that here we are altogether different. 

Stream on #Channel4
